talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Norfe${action:Talk}
(Norfe flashes a rare smile.)
Sure, go ahead. I need to think more about the restoration of the damaged facilities... and about the affairs to come.

$Mercenary Vandar$
…………………….

$Rhadames Resident$
………………

$Norfe$
First, with regards repairing the facilities…

$Sorceress Anna$
………….

$Hiver's Song Device$
I have nothing~ Nothing to eat, and nothing to wear~
Nothing to lose, so I have nothing to fear~
Nothing to leave behind when I die. No one to remember me when I die.......

${user_nick}$
(Hiver, who said she wanted to save the world, and Hiver, who is threatening the survival of Rhadames...
Are these two really the same person anymore?)

${user_nick}$
Grele…… (Now that we really have to kill Hiver... I'm sure Grele must be in anguish, too.)

${user_nick}$
Norfe must have meant what he said...

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9926_sp_01.ogg}
It's all right. I understand now. My sister who sang this song is gone.
The moment we met… The moment I saw her again, I knew... But I can't help still thinking of her as my sister.

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9936_sp_01.ogg}
Yet the moment Hiver looked at me…
My chest burned as if a knife was plunged into my heart. It was a chance for a second realization.

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9926_sp_02.ogg}
My sister once said, "Even if you get hurt… You can't change anything if you don't give your trust."
When I first heard that, I didn't know what she meant... But now...

$Grele$
Now I understand what she meant…
I understand, but I have also come to fully realize that my sister who once said that is gone for good.
My sister is gone, and only Child Hiver remains.

${user_nick}$
Grele, you don't have to….

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9926_sp_04.ogg}
I'm okay. It's just… There's a difference between knowing something and fully realizing it.
So I'm okay now. And I know what I have to do. That's why I'm going to fight.

${user_nick}$
(So Grele has made up his mind to fight. Even if it's painful, even if it's necessary to kill Hiver...)

${user_nick}$
You're right, Grele.
The people who were comforted by Hiver's songs in the past are being hurt by the heinous acts the new Hiver is carrying out.

${user_nick}$
We cannot allow her to continue carrying on like this.
I think I may have clung to a small shred of hope too, but this has to stop.

${user_nick}$
Still, there's no reason for you to be involved in the fight. It is up to us.
But you personally don't have to defeat Hiver. You've already been through too much…

$Grele${sound:npc_Grele_qu9926_sp_05.ogg}
Stop it. I will do what I must.
I'm the hope of the Anti-Goddess Faction! I can do it. I will do it. This is the last time I listen to this song.

$Hiver's Song Device$
I have nothing~ Nothing to eat, and nothing to wear~
Nothing to lose, so I have nothing to fear~
Nothing to leave behind when I die… No one to remember me when I die.......

${user_nick}$
Grele…

${user_nick}$
(Hiver's song rings out. Everyone nearby is saddened to hear it. It's not true that Hiver left nothing behind...
Or that she has no one to remember her. But we who thought Hiver could return to us…)

${user_nick}$
(Grele seems to need more time. I should talk to the other people nearby.)

$Sorceress Anna$
Oh Hiver….

${user_nick}$
Anna…

$Sorceress Anna${sound:npc_Anna_qu9926_sp_01.ogg}
Hiver believed in the goodness in others more than anyone else.
There was no one in Rhadames who was not inspired with hope when they saw Hiver.

$Sorceress Anna${sound:npc_Anna_qu9926_sp_02.ogg}
She believed we'd be all right, no matter what happened.
She encouraged everyone that things would get better if we didn't give up and had faith.

$Sorceress Anna${sound:npc_Anna_qu9926_sp_03.ogg}
If Grele was the hope of the Anti-Goddess Faction, Hiver was the hope of Rhadames.
But now... Now she has become the biggest threat to Rhadames.

${user_nick}$
Hiver… (The truth is I was turning a blind eye to her. Just because Hiver didn't go after Rhadames, it felt like she wasn't a threat. But now...)

$Sorceress Anna$
I still wonder about that. Why did it have to be Hiver? Why her of all people?
But that kind of question is no longer useful.
We have to protect Rhadames and the people here. And Hiver is...

${user_nick}$
Even though... Even the Hiver we knew isn't coming back... She was not a lie.
That's why…

$Sorceress Anna${sound:npc_Anna_qu9926_sp_04.ogg}
Are you trying to comfort me? Thanks, {user_nick}. But don't worry about me. This is but a passing sadness.
Hiver may no longer be with us... But here legacy lives on here.

$Sorceress Anna${sound:npc_Anna_qu9926_sp_05.ogg}
There are still people in Rhadames who live on through the comforting hope that Hiver gave them.
I am one of the many in Rhadames like that.

$Sorceress Anna$
Even if the Hiver we knew is gone, what we received from her will remain forever.

$Sorceress Anna${sound:npc_Anna_qu9926_sp_06.ogg}
But for now, it's okay to miss her and be sad.

${user_nick}$
(Everyone's getting through this in their own way. I should go speak with the others.)

$Rhadames Resident$
We've been through a lot. That Hiver...

$Rhadames Resident$
It's been a while since I first came here escaping the Childs, but thanks to that, I got to know her.
Hiver gave the refugees like me hope.

$Rhadames Resident$
Even after losing my home, my family, my everything...
She gave me courage and the hope that I would be fine if I didn't give up.

$Rhadames Resident$
Thanks to her, I didn't give up on life and was able to live on here.
That's why I couldn't believe what happened earlier.

$Rhadames Resident$
Thanks to Norfe's quick response, we escaped physical harm, but... My heart hurts so much.
What made her change like that?

${user_nick}$
(For those who were comforted by Hiver, this turn of events must have hit closer to home.)

$Hiver's Song Device$
I have nothing~ Nothing to eat, and nothing to wear~
Nothing to lose, so I have nothing to fear~
Nothing to leave behind when I die… No one to remember me when I die.......

$Rhadames Resident$
This song... It may seem sad, but for us it represented hope itself.
It sympathized with our own anguish,
and at the same time offered comfort, telling us that everything would be okay.

$Rhadames Resident$
No one will ever forget what happened today. At the same time... They won't just give up everything.
That is how much Rhadames and Hiver's consolation means to us.

${user_nick}$
(Everyone is having a hard time, but they are doing their best to overcome the situation.)

$Princess Sylvania$
Hmm, is that so? You know, I came out because I was worried about that same thing.
But from what I heard earlier, you're the mercenary under the command of Hwaran, so how is it that you've come to help those people?

$Mercenary Vandar$
… Well, it just sort of happened. It's a long story.

${user_nick}$
Hey that's… (Vandar? Come to think of it, we didn't finish our talk earlier, did we?)

${user_nick}$
Hey you! What are you doing here?

$Mercenary Vandar${sound:npc_Vandar_qu9926_sp_01.ogg}
What that-?!

${user_nick}$
Why so jumpy? Don't tell me... Are you cooking up your next scheme?

$Mercenary Vandar${sound:npc_Vandar_qu9926_sp_02.ogg}
It's nothing like that. I just came here to clear my head, is all.
And I was having a chat with the princess.

${user_nick}$
(There's just something so fishy about this guy...)I don't know... You look like you've been caught in the act to me. Haven't you heard the saying "Fool me once, shame on you; fool me twice, shame on me?"(Considering what happened with the Finest Stone Jade, it's hard to believe he's not scheming something.)

$Mercenary Vandar${sound:npc_Vandar_qu9926_sp_03.ogg}
Listen… What happened with the Finest Stone Jade is a long story...
Anyway, I'm sorry. Really.

${user_nick}$
… What?

$Mercenary Vandar${sound:npc_Vandar_qu9926_sp_04.ogg}
Norfe already knew that I originally came here by order of Hwaran.
I may be strong, but Hwaran is not the kind of Child you just ignore an order from.

${user_nick}$
Well… (I know all too well that a Child's orders are as good as law, but I never thought he'd apologize...)
Then why are you suddenly helping us again... I mean, if you were ordered here by Hwaran?

$Mercenary Vandar${sound:npc_Vandar_qu9926_sp_05.ogg}
… I don't want to see this place end up like the Blue Raven Territory.

${user_nick}$
Oh...

$Mercenary Vandar${sound:npc_Vandar_qu9926_sp_06.ogg}
In Mistland the Child's are law, and by law I mean the law of the jungle.
But…

$Mercenary Vandar${sound:npc_Vandar_qu9926_sp_07.ogg}
Hwaran aims to prevent a clear winner from emerging in the struggle for power in the Western Territory. She said something about the storm raging for a long time.
Yes, if Rhadames were destroyed, the Anti-Goddess Faction collapsed, and
in the meantime, Hiver or Kaunos were seriously injured or killed, that would do the trick.

$Mercenary Vandar${sound:npc_Vandar_qu9926_sp_08.ogg}
… I've seen so many people die because of the Childs, and I'm sick of it.
Let's just say I don't want to play their games anymore.

${user_nick}$
I see… (So he had no choice but to do so... He didn't want to see more people die.) So that's why you warned us?

$Mercenary Vandar${sound:npc_Vandar_qu9926_sp_09.ogg}
Yes, and why I've been helping you for the time being.

${user_nick}$
But won't violating Hwaran's orders put you in the line of fire?
And not only you, that healer friend of yours too.

$Mercenary Vandar$
Maybe not? At this rate the commander of the Western Territory may end up being Hiver or Kaunos, right?
Hwaran won't like that. She doesn't want anyone to emerge as the commander.

${user_nick}$
So it will be okay with Hwaran if you help us? (It's like... he's trying to find some self-rationalization for what he's doing.)

$Mercenary Vandar$
Indeed, so for the time being you get a strong, dashing and handsome mercenary on your side.
And at the same time, I get to do something nice for a change.

${user_nick}$
(Come to think of it…) You sure talk like a man of good will, don't you?
(He says he doesn't want anyone else to get hurt.)

$Mercenary Vandar${sound:npc_Vandar_qu9926_sp_10.ogg}
Pfft, don't get all mushy. I'm getting goosebumps.

${user_nick}$
(I can't imagine there are many Mistlanders who care much about others.)

${user_nick}$
(There are still some things I don't like about him, but... As Norfe said, I should at least
give him a chance. Maybe he's not a good person, but perhaps he's bad either.)

$Mercenary Vandar${sound:npc_Vandar_qu9926_sp_11.ogg}
Really, it's no-… Ugh...! My head… (Suddenly, he clutches around his eye in anguish.)

${user_nick}$
Are you okay? You were sick that time before, too… Is this a relapse?

$Mercenary Vandar${sound:npc_Vandar_qu9926_sp_12.ogg}
N-no… I…… I'm o-…..kay…..
Last time…I..ju-……just…needed to rest a bit……

${user_nick}$
You're so pale… We better go see Anna!

$Mercenary Vandar${sound:npc_Vandar_qu9926_sp_13.ogg}
(Removes his hand and stands up straight.) No, I'm okay now. This happens sometimes.
See, I'm just fine.

${user_nick}$
(You sure you're okay? You may be feeling better, but... Something's wrong with you. I think I've seen this somewhere before. In that place with the Monolith door...)

${user_nick}$
Are you... being influenced by some kind of mysterious power? Something is odd...

$Mercenary Vandar${sound:npc_Vandar_qu9926_sp_14.ogg}
A mysterious power, huh? Well, I am like one of those oddly mysterious, very handsome mercenaries from the story books.
Anyway... We better get down to business. What to do about Hiver, I mean.

${user_nick}$
I think... you've been carrying around a powerful curse of some kind.

$Mercenary Vandar$
Everyone says that. Are you some kind of oracle, too?

${user_nick}$
What do you mean? You really are strange.

${sound:npc_Vandar_qu9926_sp_14.ogg}$
Right, I'm that oddly mysterious, very handsome mercenary from the story books.
Anyway... We better get down to business. What to do about Hiver, I mean.

$Princess Sylvania$
We know one thing for sure.
The storm is picking up.

$Mercenary Vandar$
Oh, no doubt about it.

${user_nick}$
Let's go back for now. Norfe will be waiting for us.

$Norfe${action:Talk}
Did you get some rest? You should take a little more time, actually.
※ You have completed Chapter 19. [Rhadames in the Storm]. The next part of the story is coming soon.
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: Hiver's Song
journal.contents:
Grele looks somewhat disturbed now that killing Hiver seems inevitable. It would be best to comfort Grele. He is currently in front of Hiver's Song Device. Go to Grele.

Rhadames - Grele

journal.title: What's Left Here Ⅰ
journal.contents:
While Grele is collecting his thoughts, go see to the others. Everyone must have been shocked by what happened with Hiver. It would be nice to comfort them…

Rhadames - Sorceress Anna

journal.title: What's Left Here Ⅱ
journal.contents:
While Grele is collecting his thoughts, go see to the others. Everyone must have been shocked by what happened with Hiver. It would be nice to comfort them…

Rhadames - Rhadames Resident

journal.title: Changes
journal.contents:
While speaking with the residents of Rhadames, you see Vandar and Princess Sylvania talking. Come to think of it, you still have something to say to him, don't you? Norfe said he'd accept him, but... You still have your doubts. Take this opportunity to find out what he's scheming this time.

Rhadames - Vandar

journal.title: Rhadames in the Storm
journal.contents:
Some things about Vandar remain unclear, but after talking to him, he at least doesn't seem like a bad person. That must be why Norfe and Lapis said the same thing. You decide to trust Vandar for now, so return to Norfe.

Rhadames - Norfe
